name: Lilya's Restaurant & Grill Cafe Gourmand
address: 548 Lincoln Ave, Staten Island, NY 10306, USA

reviews.text: This is one of the best taste in NYC if I ever taste,  a special soups. THANK YOU üôè
it was the best experience in my life. Food was great as well as service.  Very friendly environment, live music and very well trained Personal.
Was invited on birthday party, and loved service and food, will definitely recommend and  will visit agsin
Khachapuri khinkapuli khinkali bomba - love it all from bbq to salads and all Georgian dishes

We recently celebrated my husband‚Äôs 50th birthday at Lilya‚Äôs Restaurant & Grill Caf√© Gourmand, and it couldn‚Äôt have been more perfect! From start to finish, the experience was absolutely outstanding.

The team went above and beyond to make the celebration special ‚Äî the service was warm, attentive, and seamless throughout the night. The food was exceptional: every dish was fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. Our guests are still raving about how delicious everything was!

The atmosphere was elegant yet cozy, making it the perfect setting for such a milestone occasion. Roma and her staff treated us like family, and we truly felt cared for in every detail.

If you‚Äôre looking for a place to host a special event or simply enjoy an incredible dining experience, I can‚Äôt recommend this restaurant highly enough. Thank you to Roma and the whole team for making my husband‚Äôs 50th birthday unforgettable!
Delicious, amazing, very professional ‚ù§Ô∏è
Amazing place! Amazing food, perfect service.  Roma and Sveta ,thank you, will definitely come back!
Outstanding service , great food and cozy atmosphere
My favorite place
Amazed by a selection of international dishes  and such a large menu when not sure what to order as so many good choices, very welcoming personnel

We did a birthday party here - amazing service, quality of food and selection
Highly recommend
I recently had dinner and it was excellent experience from start to finish.The atmosphere was cozy and welcoming .The staff were friendly and the food wsa absolutely delicious.
Delicious food excelent service
Excellent service delicious food cozy atmosphere would go back any day

Very good food,  and very friendly  people are working  in this restaurant.
Thank you.

Delicious shish kabob and homemade soup.
Great service.

We celebrated our son First Communion at Lilya's Restaurant & Grill and we couldn‚Äôt be more happy. We completely love this place, food was amazing, service so fantastic and the place was beautifully decorated. They have great menu options for all kinds of events and they are very pleasant to work with. We truly couldn‚Äôt be more happy. Everything went super smooth from the beginning to the end. Thank you kindly üëçüòÄ

Wow I‚Äôm so amazed by the service and quality of food
Definitely coming back worth the drive from Bergen county
Awesome family oriented place with great music
Perfect place

Best Armenian barbecue in the entire tristate and that‚Äôs a fact! Now this is the authentic taste we needed all along. Can‚Äôt wait to try other dishes from the menu - they have everything I missed. Delicious food and fantastic service:  qualifies at least for one of Michelin star restaurant‚Äôs criteria - which is WORTH THE TRIP- if you‚Äôre coming from Manhattan, take the ferry! It‚Äôs so fun!
We had lunch there after a funeral. Unlike previous times when there was plenty of good, home-tasting food, it was embarrassingly scarce and tasteless. For 65+ service fee.
Great place to celebrate special occasion on weekend with music and dancing or just have a simple dinner during during the week
Celebrated our anniversary at this place. Can‚Äôt wait to go back! The food , the music, the service and the atmosphere were a top notch!
The delicious food, the lively atmosphere, and fun live music made our celebration unforgettable. The staff is attentive and pleasant. Highly recommend this restaurant.
Delicious food and friendly service
We had a great birthday dinner.

Lilya‚Äôs Restaurant & Grill Cafe Gourmand is a fantastic spot that excels in both food and service. From the moment you walk in, the warm and welcoming atmosphere sets the tone for a great dining experience. The staff is attentive, friendly, and always ready to make sure everything is perfect.

The quality and freshness of the food stand out, making every visit enjoyable. Whether you‚Äôre stopping by for a casual meal or a special occasion, Lilya‚Äôs never disappoints. If you‚Äôre looking for a restaurant that truly values its customers and delivers excellence, this is the place to go. Highly recommended!
Good atmosphere service and food, good selection, fresh and welcoming. Highly recommends
best place on Island
The food is fresh and authentic and the service is top notch as always.
It is a very nice place with a wonderful friendly service and great delicious food!
Good atmosphere, delicious food, nice people. We were really enjoying our time there
Very beautiful place! We celebrated my husband's birthday, he was happy! The food was very tasty, the service was top notch! The music was such that you wanted to dance! I recommend!
Great food and service, menu selection oitstanding
chilled here with friends ‚Äì cozy vibes, great food, and manager Roman is a total charmer. armenians , you‚Äôll love it. perfect spot for everyone)
It's a great place, delicious food and a friendly restaurant, and the manager is a very polite young man.
Was very good food end service recommended

My wife and I came here for the first time. Recommended by my wife's friend. Rusian,Eastern European,  Mediterranean food. Prices were a little high for the portions that you received. Some dishes were a little too salty for our tastes. Very quite,  but it was a Wednesday night. The service was excellent. I diffently will go back to try other dishes, and to try their dessert, unfortunately we did not have any on this visit. Large menu, big variety.

The restaurant was nice.  It was for my nephew's first birthday party and the setup was well done, even though the space wasn't that large.  It's not a very big restaurant.  Our party took up the whole place.  Service was very good.  They were on top of things like changing your plate out.

I didn't touch most of the stuff but to be fair, my sister-in-law did order a whole LOT of food.  I didn't even know what most of the stuff was.  Russian food in general tends to be a lot of tubers and pickled items.  For instance, we had an entire plate of pickled fruit that completely grossed out the kids.  My son couldn't stop gagging at the food on his plate. He was hungry, so we gave him a little bit of everything so he could try.  To his credit, he did give it all a taste but he couldn't get through the first bite.  Then the smell made him want to hurl, so we just had to remove the whole plate from him.  There was a pickled herring that even the Russians at my table wouldn't eat.

There was one very delicious entree.  It was some kind of battered fish with white sauce, rosemary and lemon.  It was very good, super clean and tasted like really moist white meat chicken.  Overall, though, the food wasn't fantastic and would not revisit.

Well ok, this place in Staten Island is a fancy restaurant and is a great place to eat if you want good food and a nice place to eat. Seems like they even have weddings at this place.
I was there with family end of December in the afternoon. Food was great and they have many different culturally diverse dishes but Middle Eastern food is their concentration but yummy food after all.

Overall, was a great place to eat and price may seem high but you don‚Äôt eat here every day so it‚Äôs worthwhile.  Definitely try their Dolma which is the stuffed grape leaves.
I would recommend this restaurant to everyone at least once.

Went to dinner at this Georgia (Russian) restaurant in Staten Island.  I ordered the lamb Shish kabob.  The lamb was very tasty but a little over cooked with some pieces very tuff to chew.  Other pieces of lamb were a little more tender.  The palmeini was veal stuffed and delicious. The other appetizer,  the cheese stuffed bread, was also very good and there was plenty of it.  For desert, cream puff and espresso.  Delicious!  For a while the service was excellent,  but later the waiter was busy somewhere else so we had to wait for a while for the check. Also, I must say that this restaurant is a little pricey.

Been to this place multiple times for birthday banquets. I would say one of the best places to celebrate. The food is great, I absolutely love their foie gras, never had a dish there, that I didn't like. Their waiters are attentive and the‚Ä¶

I recently hosted a big party at Lilya‚Äôs Restaurant and Grill Cafe Gourmand, and it was absolutely amazing. From the live music to the dance floor, everything was perfect. It‚Äôs the only place on Staten Island where I can truly make the event feel like my own, almost like hosting a party at home, but with a stage, a dance floor, and the most incredible food I‚Äôve ever had. Their bread is out of this world, too. it‚Äôs so divine that sometimes I go just to order a ton of it! The atmosphere is so welcoming, and my friends had an unforgettable time dancing and enjoying themselves. I couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better place to celebrate. highly recommend it for any special occasion better than any place i have tried.

Perfect place, we‚Äôve been here before with our family, and after that I decided to celebrate my Birthday with friends! Everything was very nice! Decor! Atmosphere üòç My guests are satisfied with party and food and personal and Live music!ü§©ü•≥üî•‚Ä¶

The food was horrible.
The friends of mine invited me to come here.
So we ordered shish kebab with grilled veggies and puree, julienne and salads.
The salads were OK, julienne was way too salty, vegetables were good.
But shish kebab was horrible, it was either done with the not fresh/frozen meat or it was cooked couple of days ago and waiting for us in the fridge.
I was unable to eat it, took it home, but once I got there my family shared my thoughts telling that it smells the strange way, and same thing with the taste, so we just threw it to the garbage.

Wonderful food and service had enjoyed the kebabs just the way I remember my Armenian friends had prepared soo juicy and delicious not overly dry that is hard to bite . For the deserts we tried a variety and they are no mach to rest of the food Napoleon, baklava cakes were too dry and not tasty at all wish they were a bit better to make it tge perfect experience.
All in all loved the place and would definitely recommend and come again.
Thank you!

The ambiance of this restaurant is simply fantastic! The cozy atmosphere, soft lighting, and elegant decor create the perfect setting for any special occasion.Great music ! If you‚Äôre a foodie like me, you‚Äôll love this place! The menu has a fantastic selection of dishes, and we loved everything we tried .I can't wait to come back again!The staff here truly cares about their guests. A big thank you to  Roman, for providing outstanding service throughout our meal. Roman made us feel like VIPs :)

"Great food.  Excellent service. Good entertainment" this was my review half a year ago. Went back to the restaurant 2 days ago and the food was not as great, overdone shish kebab , especially liver. At 10:30 pm we were told to leave the place because they were only open till 9pm and we overstayed as is . When we booked a party of 10 nobody told us the place was only open till 9. We were promised music if the banquet was for 10 or more people, but at the last minute the music was canceled.

Classic Russian cuisine with some Mediterranean and Italian notes. Great food, lively atmosphere. Very decent performers on occasion. My one request would be to keep parties' children at their respective tables, not a fan of having my things knocked over repeatedly as I try to enjoy my meal.
I've been invited there 2 times, love it. The best one!

Dear Svetlana and Roma,
We would like to express our heartfelt thanks for hosting such a wonderful celebration at your restaurant. Last Sunday, we celebrated both my husband‚Äôs and my birthdays with family and friends at Lilya's Restaurant & Grill Cafe Gourmand, and it was truly an unforgettable experience.
The food was absolutely delicious, the music was fantastic, and the atmosphere was warm and charming. Your exceptional service made the event even more special. We are incredibly grateful for everything you did to make our birthdays so memorable.
We look forward to returning in the future and will certainly recommend your restaurant to others.
With warm regards,
Irina & Dmitriy

We‚Äôre excited to come here because there aren‚Äôt a lot of Armenian restaurants.

Terrible service.  Food kept arriving at random times‚Äîsome people had their main dish, others had to wait another twenty minutes for theirs.

When food finally arrived, many of the dishes were tepid, lukewarm.

The khachapuri was made with mozzarella instead of the traditional suluguni.

Food wasn‚Äôt flavorful.  Very few vegetarian options.  Food was not tasty at all.

Bread was not fresh.  Not a single item was a pleasure to eat.

Overall, one of the worst experiences in a restaurant.  Shameful.

This restaurant is outstanding! The music, atmosphere, and food are all top-notch. We hosted four banquets (for 20+) here in two weeks, and each one surpassed the last. Highly recommend for any event!

Unfortunately we were there not for the best occasion - it was after the funeral dinner.
However, the venue is impressive. The food was really good, the service was great. They were very attentive, but not over the board, as it happens in such cases.
They also let you bring your own alcohol, which makes it easier.
I believe, everything went quite smoothly.
The interior and ambiance are quite nice too.

We celebrated my husband's birthday at Lilya's Restaurant & Grill.
The food was excellent and cooked perfectly.
The service and life music were unbelievable.
The owner came to our table to introduce himself and took time after the party to talk to us and listen to our suggestions.
Our waiter was so attentive and accommodating.
We had a wonderful experience at this restaurant!
A wonderful place for a birthday party with family and friends. It has everything you could possibly wish for: amazing food, very friendly and attentive service and lovely music. Highly recommended!

Had my mom‚Äôs surprise party here and I can‚Äôt say enough about this place. It wasn‚Äôt our first time here and definitely won‚Äôt be our last. Tanya the manager was extremely helpful , sweet, and easy to communicate with since day one. The staff is super friendly, food is great, and the music, dancing and atmosphere overall is all you could ask for. Can‚Äôt wait to be back for another party already! Highly recommend!
